blogs.author: Vansh

blogs.title: Hello World
blogs.body: In some cases, you will need to ensure that the html/body element's height is set to 100%.  For vertical alignment, set the parent element's width/height to 100% and add display: table. Then for the child element, change the display to table-cell and add vertical-align: middle.  For horizontal centering, you could either add text-align: center to center the text and any other inline children elements. Alternatively, you could use margin: 0 auto assuming the element is block level
blogs.author: Aran
